jobDescription: We are looking for a research scientist with solid background in communications systems, familiar with 5G technology and standards, with experience/interests in networking and optimization. This position requires in-depth knowledge of SDN/NFV technologies and hands on experience in software development. Activity and knowledge of open source communities or standards activities a plus.Additional Information:Job Requirements: PhD or experienced MS, in Math, Communication, EE or Computer Science  Education and experiences in communication systems; Familiar with 5G standards and architecture. Ideally with network planning and optimization experience.  Must have strong software skills, data management, and it is a plus to have experience/background in Machine Learning/AI creation and application.A plus to have experience in SDN/NFV technologies.  Important to have key leadership skills including good communication and be able to contribute in small teams to deliver innovative solutions in a highly competitive industry.
